Title: SAMPLE 03
Credit: Written By
Author: Jane Doe
Source: Source by The JD
Draft date: 1/1/2018
Content:

ACME Examples Productions
1234 5th Avenue
Anytown, Planet Earth, 12345-7890


FADE IN:

INT. STUDIO APARTMENT - NIGHT

The AUTHOR sits at a desk.

AUTHOR
(anguished)
Writers block again!

DISSOLVES TO:

EXT. PARK - DAY

Author is jogging. DOG runs up to her and speaks in a human voice.

DOG
Bark! Bark! Roof! Your not blocked. You're trying to write the story from the wrong chacacter's viewpoint.

AUTHOR
(disbelief)
But you spoke?

DOG
That goes without saying, better run along before you loose your cardio moment.

FADE TO BLACK.

THE END.
